summary: This is an email from a legal assistant to an unidentified recipient regarding a Chapter 7 bankruptcy case. The email informs the recipient that a motion has been filed to excuse their appearance from a creditors' meeting and provides instructions for completing and notarizing interrogatory documents.

persons.name: Legal Assistant
persons.context: The sender of the email who is providing instructions regarding bankruptcy proceedings and document completion.

events.title: 341 Meeting of Creditors
events.description: A scheduled meeting of creditors in a Chapter 7 bankruptcy case that the recipient's appearance has been excused from.

events.title: Motion Filed to Excuse Appearance
events.description: A motion was filed to excuse the recipient from attending the 341 Meeting of Creditors.

keyFacts: The document is an email related to a Chapter 7 bankruptcy case.
A motion was filed to excuse an individual's appearance from a 341 Meeting of Creditors scheduled for August 5, 2019.
The email contains instructions for the recipient to complete and notarize interrogatory documents and return them via mail.
